section.p:
There is
1 Cargo Unit of spices
in the ship’s hold, which you can take if you have room for it. (You can, of course, jettison existing cargo to make room for it if you wish.)
The first mate reports finding no sign of life aboard the ship. ‘Looks like she was abandoned all of a sudden, captain,’ he says. ‘We found a couple of things you might want.’

He hands you a
mariner’s ruttier and a
. Note these items down if you want to keep them, then .
